about_the_game:
Step into the fantastical world of Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed! Try the Free Demo now and get a glimpse of Mickey Mouse’s exciting adventure in this stunningly reimagined 3D platformer.

  • Explore a reimagined Wasteland, full of Disney's timeless characters and stories.
  • Wield the magic brush: Paint to create, thinner to alter. Every choice shapes your story.
  • Meet Oswald the Lucky Rabbit, Disney's original star, in a rich, narrative-driven world.
  • Enjoy advanced gameplay with new abilities and enhanced visuals in a classic setting.
  • Mickey has new moves such as dash, ground pound and sprinting.
detailed_description:
Step into the fantastical world of Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed! Try the Free Demo now and get a glimpse of Mickey Mouse’s exciting adventure in this stunningly reimagined 3D platformer.

  • Explore a reimagined Wasteland, full of Disney's timeless characters and stories.
  • Wield the magic brush: Paint to create, thinner to alter. Every choice shapes your story.
  • Meet Oswald the Lucky Rabbit, Disney's original star, in a rich, narrative-driven world.
  • Enjoy advanced gameplay with new abilities and enhanced visuals in a classic setting.
  • Mickey has new moves such as dash, ground pound and sprinting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX - 4300 / Intel Core i3 - 4130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX - 8300 x8 / Intel Core i5 - 3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 / GeForce GTX 1050Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Step into the fantastical world of Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed! Try the Free Demo now and get a glimpse of Mickey Mouse’s exciting adventure in this stunningly reimagined 3D platformer.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Norwegian*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
